title: Spiced chicken pie
ingredients: ['1 (450g) pack Jus-Rol shortcrust pastry sheets', '675g chicken, cut into bite-sized pieces', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons white wine', '2 tablespoons pitted and chopped dates', '70g ground almonds', '60g Cheddar cheese, grated', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground mace', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '250ml chicken stock']
